panels.name: Cluster Number
panels.description: Num of  Doris Clusters

panels.name: Frontends Status
panels.description:
Dead Frontends will be shown as Colored points.
If all Frontends are alive, all points should be Green.

panels.name: Backends status
panels.description:
Dead Backends will be shown as Colored points.
If all Backends are alive, all points should be Green.

panels.name: Cluster FE JVM Heap Stat
panels.description: The JVM heap usage percent of each Frontend of each Doris cluster.

targets.expr: sum(jvm_heap_size_bytes{group="fe", type="used"} * 100) by (instance, job) / sum(jvm_heap_size_bytes{group="fe", type="max"}) by (instance, job)

panels.name: Cluster BE CPU Idle
panels.description:
The Backend CPU idle overview of each Doris cluster.
The detail Backend CPU idle info can be seen in 'BE' section.

panels.name: Cluster BE Mem Stat
panels.description:
The Backend memory usage overview of each Doris cluster.
The detail backend memory usage can be seen in 'BE' section.

panels.name: Cluster QPS Stat
panels.description:
QPS statistic group by cluster.
The QPS of each cluster is the sum of all queries processed on all Frontends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Disk State
panels.description: The Disk state. GREEN point means this disk is ONLINE. RED point means this disk is OFFLINE

panels.name: [$cluster_name] FE Node
panels.description: Total Frontends node number

panels.name: [$cluster_name]  FE Alive
panels.description: Total alive number of Frontends. Normally, it should be equal to the Total number of Frontends

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE Node
panels.description: Total Backends node number

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE Alive
panels.description: Total alive number of Backends. Normally, it should be equal to the Total number of Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Used Capacity
panels.description: Total used disk capacity of all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Total Capacity
panels.description: Total disk capacity of all Backends

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Max Replayed journal id
panels.description:
The max replayed meta data journal id on Frontends.
Normally, all Frontends should be same on this metrics, or just slightly different for a short period.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Image counter
panels.description:
The counter of meta data image generation on Master Frontend. And the counter of image successfully pushing to other Non-master Frontends.
These metrics is expected to increase at reasonable intervals. And normally, they should be equal.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BDBJE Write
panels.description: The left Y axes shows write latency of 99th. The right Y axes shows the write per seconds of journal.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BDBJE Read
panels.description: The left Y axes shows the read per seconds of journal.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Edit Log Size
panels.description: The edit log size for each FE

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Edit Log Clean
panels.description: The edit log clean of each FE

panels.name: [$cluster_name] FE Collect Compaction Score
panels.description: The FE collect compaction score of each BE

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE Compaction Score
panels.description: The compaction score of each BE

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Image Write
panels.description: The image Write of each FE

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Image Push
panels.description: The image push of each FE

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Image Clean
panels.description: The image clean of each FE

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Scheduling Tablets
panels.description: Number of tablets begin scheduled. These tablet may be in recovery process or balance process

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE IO Util
panels.description: The max IO util of each Backend

panels.name: [$cluster_name] RPS
panels.description:
Requests per seconds on each Frontends.
Requests include all requests sending to the Frontends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] QPS
panels.description:
Queries per seconds on each Frontends.
Queries only include Select requests.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] 99th Latency
panels.description: 99 quantiles of query latency on each Frontends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] [$fe_instance] Query Percentile
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates 95 to 99 quantiles of query latency on each Frontends.
Right Y axes indicates the query rate per 1 min.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Query Error [1m]
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the accumulated  error queries number.
Right Y axes indicates the error query rate per 1 min.
Normally, the error query rate should be 0.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Connections
panels.description: The connections' number to each Frontends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Broker Load Job
panels.description: Statistic of Broker load jobs's num in each Load State.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Insert Load Job
panels.description: Statistic of load jobs's num  in each Load State which is generated by Insert Stmt.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Routine Load Job
panels.description: Statistic of Routine load jobs's num in each Load State.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Spark Load Job
panels.description: Statistic of Spark load jobs's num in each Load State.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Broker load tendency
panels.description: The trend report of broker load job

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Insert load tendency
panels.description: The trend report of insert load job

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Routine load tendency
panels.description: The trend report of routine load job

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Spark load tendency
panels.description: The trend report of spark load job

panels.name: [$cluster_name] SC Job
panels.description: Number of running schema change jobs.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Report queue size
panels.description: Queue size of report in Master FE.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Rollup Job
panels.description: Number of running rollup jobs.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Txn Begin/Success on FE
panels.description: Show the number and rate of txn begin and success

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Txn Failed/Reject on FE
panels.description: Show the failed txn request. Including rejected request and failed txn

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Publish Task on BE
panels.description: The number of total publish task request and error rate.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] fe_txn_status
panels.description: Show the txn rstatus on FE

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Txn Load Bytes/Rows rate
panels.description: Left Y axes indicates the total received bytes rate of txn. Right Y axes indicates the loaded rows rate of txn.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] [$fe_instance] JVM Heap
panels.description:
JVM Heap usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used/max heap size.
Right Y Axes shows the used percentage.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] [$fe_instance] JVM Non Heap
panels.description:
JVM Non Heap usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used/committed non heap size.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] [$fe_instance] JVM Old
panels.description:
JVM old generation usage of specified Frontend. Left Y Axes shows the used/max old generation size. Right Y Axes shows the used percentage.
Normally, the usage percentage should be less than 80%.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] [$fe_instance] JVM Old GC
panels.description:
JVM full gc stat of specified Frontend. 
Left Y Axes shows times of full gc.
Right Y Axes shows the time cost of each full gc.

targets.expr: sum(jvm_old_gc{job="$cluster_name", instance="$fe_instance", type="time"}) / sum(jvm_old_gc{job="$cluster_name", instance="$fe_instance", type="count"})

panels.name: [$cluster_name] [$fe_instance] JVM Young
panels.description:
JVM young generation usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used/max young generation size.
Right Y Axes shows the used percentage.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] [$fe_instance] JVM Young GC
panels.description:
JVM young gc stat of specified Frontend. 
Left Y Axes shows times of young gc.
Right Y Axes shows the time cost of each young gc.

targets.expr: sum(jvm_young_gc{job="$cluster_name", instance="$fe_instance", type="time"}) / sum(jvm_young_gc{job="$cluster_name", instance="$fe_instance", type="count"})

panels.name: [$cluster_name] JVM Threads
panels.description: Num of threads of FE JVM

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE CPU Idle
panels.description:
CPU idle stat of Backends.
Low means CPU is busy.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE Mem
panels.description: Memory usage of Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Net send/receive bytes
panels.description: Network send(Left Y)/receive(Right Y) bytes rate of all device except 'lo'

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Disk Usage
panels.description: Disk capacity usage of Backends

targets.expr: (SUM(doris_be_disks_total_capacity{job="$cluster_name"}) by (instance, path) - SUM(doris_be_disks_avail_capacity{job="$cluster_name"}) by (instance, path)) / SUM(doris_be_disks_total_capacity{job="$cluster_name"}) by (instance, path)

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Tablet Distribution
panels.description: Number of tablets of each Backends

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE FD count
panels.description: The file descriptor usage of Backends. Left Y axes shows the used fd num. Right Y axes shows the soft limit open file number.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE thread num
panels.description: The thread number of Backends

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Disk IO util
panels.description:
IO util of Backends.
High means I/O is busy.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE Compaction Base
panels.description:
Base compaction rate of Backends.
Normally, base compaction only runs between 20:00 to 4:00 and it is configurable.
Right Y axes indicates the total base compaction bytes.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE Compaction Cumulate
panels.description:
Cumulative compaction rate of Backends.
Right Y axes indicates the total cumulative compaction bytes.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE Push Bytes
panels.description:
Loading rate of Backends.
This indicates the rate of file downloading in LOADING state of load job(MINI and BROKER load).
Right Y axes indicates the total rate of file downloading.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE Push Rows
panels.description:
Loading rows rate of Backends.
This indicates the rate of rows loaded in LOADING state of load job. Right Y axes shows the total push rate of cluster.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Tablet Meta Write
panels.description: Left Y axes shows the write rate of tablet header saved in rocksdb. Right Y axes shows the duration of each write operation.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] BE Scan Rows
panels.description:
Scan rows rate of Backends.
This indicates the read rows rate when processing queries.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Tablet Meta Read
panels.description: Left Y axes shows the read rate of tablet header saved in rocksdb. Right Y axes shows the duration of each read operation.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Tablets Report
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Single Tablet Report
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Finish task report
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Push Task
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Push Task Cost Time
panels.description: The average cost time of push tasks on each Backend.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Delete
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Base Compaction
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Cumulative Compaction
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Clone
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Create rollup
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Schema change
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.

panels.name: [$cluster_name] Create tablet
panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.
